plot: Needing to get away from the wife and kids, Felix sneaks down to the local burlesque theater, where he meets Kitty, a dancer. Just when he thinks he'll be making a little whoopee with Kitty...
title: Felix the Gay Dog
plot_es: Needing to get away from the wife and kids, Felix sneaks down to the local burlesque theater, where he meets Kitty, a dancer. Just when he thinks he'll be making a little whoopee with Kitty...
plot_en: Needing to get away from the wife and kids, Felix sneaks down to the local burlesque theater, where he meets Kitty, a dancer. Just when he thinks he'll be making a little whoopee with Kitty...
